author: Matthew Struck
comment: Downloaded watch face because of the metallic blue color on my Huawei watch and it looks great! The ambience mode could be a little better (didn't show the info circles) but does show the date which was a must for me. I like that you can customize the face but is limited to things like the length of the tick marks.
title: Stylish metal watch face

author: Patrick Hill
comment: I had the LG Urbane and my favorite face was the stock Chronus face. I just got the Huawei Watch and was going to miss the LG face.  This one is not identical but it's very similar in color and style and Im happy with it
title: Love it

author: Chris Perkins
comment: I really like the look of the watch face, but a full color ambient mode would make it perfect. It looks too good to be hidden by a black and white ambient mode! Also, an option to increase the screen on time before ambient turns on would be appreciated.

author: Khoa Nguyen
comment: Best purchase for custom watch face.  The sweeping seconds hand is perfect and the dark blue starburst dial blends in beautifully with my ZenWatch 2's midnight blue bezel!  Please add a Second Time Zone dial!

author: Petr Rieger
comment: Watch face look nice, but app did not made any shortcut to configuration so I needed to create my own to configuration activity. It is buggy I guess

author: Aaron Smekal
comment: Why get rid of the transparency adjustment from the free version?

author: Steve Keen
comment: There are so many watch faces out there that either have poor ambient displays or chew up your battery.  These faces tick all of the boxes.  Great work!!!!!
title: Best faces out there

author: Hung Le
comment: Last updated was in March so it isn't compatible with new Android Watch. It never showed up in watch faces.
title: Does not work at all!!!

author: Kieran Lewis
comment: Exactly the same as the Chronos watch face from the LG Urbane
title: Copied
